docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On baseball column observes that Xander Bogaerts, young shortstop for the Boston Red Sox, is trying to follow the example set by his favorite player, New York Yankees Derek Jeter, right down to the new number on his jersey.

docs.abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Masahiro Tanaka encounters few problems in his second spring training start through four and a third innings, striking out six while allowing one run and three hits in a 7-4 Yankees win over Atlanta Braves.

docs.snippet: Adrian Gonzalez ripped line drives to all areas of the park, often scattering his Los Angeles Dodgers teammates in the outfield from the safety of the batting cage. It was just a few hours after arriving in Australia, with his body thinking it was...
docs.lead_paragraph: Adrian Gonzalez ripped line drives to all areas of the park, often scattering his Los Angeles Dodgers teammates in the outfield from the safety of the batting cage. It was just a few hours after arriving in Australia, with his body thinking it was about midnight.

docs.abstract: Charlie Porter, self-taught mountaineer and climate scientist who became most famous for climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park, dies at age 63.
